```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
vgsales <- read.csv('vgsales.csv')
as.data.frame(vgsales)
sum(is.na(vgsales))
na.omit(vgsales)
as.numeric(vgsales$Year)
head(vgsales)
summary(vgsales)
```


```{r}
#
vg_pub = subset(vgsales, (Rank <= 50 & Year >= 2000), select = c(Publisher, NA_Sales, EU_Sales, JP_Sales, Other_Sales, Global_Sales, Year))
#summary(vg_pub)
#sum(vg_pub$NA_Sales)



#vg_pub
ggplot(vg_pub, aes(Publisher,NA_Sales)) + geom_boxplot() + geom_point(aes(color = Year))+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1))+ labs(title="Distribution of North American Sales by Publisher for Top 50 Games by Sales",  subtitle = '2001-2015',y = "North American Sales (millions)")


ggplot(vg_pub, aes(Publisher,NA_Sales)) + geom_violin() + geom_point(aes(color = Year))+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) + labs(title="Distribution of North American Sales by Publisher for Top 50 Games by Sales",  subtitle = '2001-2015',y = "North American Sales (millions)")

```
